title.zh: 武汉：左钰洁获华中科技大学社会公益学生奖学金
title.en: Wuhan: Yujie (Ruby) Zuo Receives Social Welfare Student Scholarship from HUST

subtitle.zh: 血友病女性关爱公益工作获得认可
subtitle.en: Hemophilia Women's Care Public Welfare Work Recognized

description.zh: 左钰洁因其在血友病女性关爱领域的突出贡献，获得华中科技大学“社会公益学生奖学金”。这一荣誉充分肯定了她在推动血友病女性群体关注、开展科普宣传、组织公益检测等方面的卓越表现，也体现了高等院校对学生参与社会公益事业的鼓励和支持。
description.en: Yujie (Ruby) Zuo received the 'Social Welfare Student Scholarship' from Huazhong University of Science and Technology for her outstanding contributions in the field of hemophilia women's care. This honor fully recognizes her excellent performance in promoting attention to the female hemophilia community, conducting popular science education, and organizing charity testing activities, and also reflects the encouragement and support of higher education institutions for students' participation in social welfare causes.
